channel.title: How do I give thanks to an Auxy user, if he isn't registered here?
channel.description: I really want to thank Auxy user, "Froman", but he(/she?), don't have an account here on Auxy Disco. How can I send them thanks for getting me into certain sounds, all because of their song, "The Right Mindset"?

item.title: How do I give thanks to an Auxy user, if he isn't registered here?
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
No, their project was reposted to the Auxy feed…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I give thanks to an Auxy user, if he isn't registered here?

item.description:

(also, he does have a disco account… I don’t think he uses it though @FroMan)
